t: Brand of the Absolute | Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
s: Effect: Allows the benefits from Absolute Equipment. (Absolute's Warboard, Faithbreaker, Gloves of Power, Ring of Absolute Force, Vision of the Absolute) There are no mechanical or story drawbacks to becoming branded, beyond a one-time disapproval for some Companions.
